channel.title: Hehe i need help with pkpoints :P
channel.description:
can anyone help me with making pkpoints like that but its gonna be rarepoints becuz im gonna add a safezone in wildy and in there npc's that give rarepoints and for that the points gives rares at the shop :)
can anyone tell my where to put the things to get it to work and what?
and they who help me if i add that npc another place does it still give rarepoints

Nothing is better than Hyperion.

Final Devo 2.7 - Shard - Hyperion

Thats how it goes for me

item.source: Hehe i need help with pkpoints :P

item.title: Hehe i need help with pkpoints :P
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

In future, please post what you’ve already tried. This is pretty much adding values to an integer. If you managed to get ninety errors by this, I really suggest you read up on some simple Java. :s

Declare:

	public int rarePoints;

Work out where to put the below code. It increases ‘rarePoints’ by one.

rarePoints++; sendMessage("Your rare points are now " + rarePoints + ".");

Next, find the method used for saving/loading the character and use what’s already there to figure out how to load and save rarePoints.

If I’ve misunderstood what you need help with, just say. I don’t fully understand what you said, but from what I gathered you needed rarePoints to increase when the player kills another player.

Read full topic
